content.html: When people ask me how they can become a senior engineer I always tell them to write docs Figure out how something works that’s not documented and write the docs It’ll outlive any code you could write to improve the service
content.value:
When people ask me how they can become a senior engineer I always tell them to write docs

Figure out how something works that’s not documented and write the docs

It’ll outlive any code you could write to improve the service
